text: Xallxh di thrng hı xal-kaxbah xanpen ba thi txng ham nan pen thi darng xyu sahrab mnusʹy læa deuxn thi txng ham læa satw phli læa satw thi thuk swm kheruxnghmay wi thi khx pheux pen satw phli dwy nan k pheux phwk cea ca di ru wa thæ cring xallxh thrng ru sing thi xyu nı brrda chan fa læa sing thi xyu nı phændin læa thæ cring xallxh thrng rxbru nı thuksingthukxyang
